import womenjacket from "../images/womenJacket1.jpg"

const womenjacket1 = require("../images/womenJacket.png").default
const womenjacket2 = require('../images/womenJacket2.png').default
const womenjacket3 = require('../images/womenJacket3.png').default

const menjacket = require('../images/menJacket1.png').default
const menjacket2 = require('../images/menJacket3.jpg').default
const menjacket3 = require('../images/menJacket2.jpg').default

const redDress = require('../images/vaydo1.jpg').default
const redDress2 = require('../images/vaydo2.jpg').default
const redDress3 = require('../images/vaydo3.jpg').default

const womenPants = require('../images/quantrang.jpg').default
const womenPants2 = require('../images/quanbe.jpg').default
const womenPants3 = require('../images/quanvang.jpg').default

const menShirt = require('../images/sominam.jpg').default
const menShirt2 = require('../images/sominam2.jpg').default
const menShirt3 = require('../images/sominam3.jpg').default

const womenShirt = require('../images/womenShirt.png').default
const womenShirt2 = require('../images/sominu.jpg').default
const womenShirt3 = require('../images/sominu3.jpg').default

const womenTshirt = require('../images/tshirt1.png').default

const suit3 = require('../images/suit3.jpg').default

const blazer = require('../images/blazer.jpg').default

const blazer3 = require('../images/blazer3.jpg').default

const swimsuit = require('../images/swimsuit1.jpg').default

const swimsuit3 = require('../images/swimsuit3.jpg').default

const aokhoacdai = require('../images/aokhoacdai.jpg').default
const aokhoacdai2 = require('../images/aokhoacdai1.jpg').default
const aokhoacdai3 = require('../images/aokhoacdai2.jpg').default

const aolennu = require('../images/aolennu1.jpg').default

const aolennu3 = require('../images/aolennu3.jpg').default

const aolennam = require('../images/aolennam1.jpg').default
const aolennam2 = require('../images/aolennam2.jpg').default
const aolennam3 = require('../images/aolennam3.jpg').default

const yemvay = require('../images/yemvay.jpg').default

const yemvay3 = require('../images/yemvay3.jpg').default

const croptop = require('../images/croptop.jpg').default

const croptop3 = require('../images/croptop3.jpg').default

const vaysomi = require('../images/vaysomi.jpg').default
const vaysomi2 = require('../images/vaysomi2.jpg').default
const vaysomi3 = require('../images/vaysomi3.jpg').default


const products = [
    {
        id: 1,
        title: "Áo khoác nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: womenjacket1,
        image02: womenjacket2,
        image03: womenjacket3,
        categorySlug: "ao-khoac",
        colors: ["xanh", "bạc"],
        slug: "ao-khoac-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 2,
        title: "Áo khoác nam",
        price: "240000",
        image01: menjacket,
        image02: menjacket2,
        image03: menjacket3,
        categorySlug: "ao-khoac",
        colors: ["xanh", "bạc", "đen"],
        slug: "ao-khoac-nam,",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 3,
        title: "Quần dài nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: womenPants,
        image02: womenPants2,
        image03: womenPants3,
        categorySlug: "quan-nu",
        colors: ["vàng", "trắng", "be"],
        slug: "quan-dai-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 4,
        title: "Váy nữ đỏ",
        price: "180000",
        image01: redDress,
        image02: redDress2,
        image03: redDress3,
        categorySlug: "vay",
        colors: [],
        slug: "vay-nu-do",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 5,
        title: "Sơ mi nam",
        price: "200000",
        image01: menShirt,
        image02: menShirt2,
        image03: menShirt3,
        categorySlug: "ao-somi",
        colors: ["xanh", "trắng", "đỏ"],
        slug: "somi-nam",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 6,
        title: "Sơ mi nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: womenShirt,
        image02: womenShirt2,
        image03: womenShirt3,
        categorySlug: "ao-somi",
        colors: ["xanh", "hồng", "be"],
        slug: "somi-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 7,
        title: "Áo thun nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: womenTshirt,
        image02: womenTshirt2,
        image03: womenTshirt3,
        categorySlug: "ao-thun",
        colors: ["trắng 1", "trắng 2", "trắng 3"],
        slug: "ao-thun-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 8,
        title: "Áo dài nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: aodai,
        image02: aodai2,
        image03: aodai3,
        categorySlug: "ao-dai",
        colors: ["xanh", "trắng", "vàng"],
        slug: "ao-dai-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 9,
        title: "quần short nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: shortnu,
        image02: shortnu2,
        image03: shortnu3,
        categorySlug: "quan-short",
        colors: ["be", "đen", "trắng"],
        slug: "quan-short-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 10,
        title: "chân váy nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: skirt,
        image02: skirt2,
        image03: skirt3,
        categorySlug: "vay",
        colors: ["trắng", "xám"],
        slug: "chan-vay-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 11,
        title: "Yếm bò nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: yembo,
        image02: yembo2,
        image03: yembo3,
        categorySlug: "yem",
        colors: ["xanh"],
        slug: "yem-bo-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 12,
        title: "suit nam",
        price: "200000",
        image01: suit,
        image02: suit2,
        image03: suit3,
        categorySlug: "ao-suit",
        colors: ["xanh", "đen", "đỏ"],
        slug: "ao-suit-nam",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 13,
        title: "Áo blazer nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: blazer,
        image02: blazer2,
        image03: blazer3,
        categorySlug: "ao-khoac",
        colors: ["đen"],
        slug: "ao-blazer-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 14,
        title: "Áo swimsuit nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: swimsuit,
        image02: swimsuit2,
        image03: swimsuit3,
        categorySlug: "swimsuit",
        colors: ["black"],
        slug: "swimt-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 15,
        title: "Áo khoác dài nam",
        price: "200000",
        image01: aokhoacdai,
        image02: aokhoacdai2,
        image03: aokhoacdai3,
        categorySlug: "ao-khoac",
        colors: ["hồng", "trắng", "đen"],
        slug: "ao-khoac-nam",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 16,
        title: "Áo len nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: aolennu,
        image02: aolennu2,
        image03: aolennu3,
        categorySlug: "ao-len",
        colors: ["be", "nâu"],
        slug: "ao-len-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 17,
        title: "Áo len nam",
        price: "200000",
        image01: aolennam,
        image02: aolennam2,
        image03: aolennam3,
        categorySlug: "ao-len",
        colors: ["xanh", "trắng"],
        slug: "ao-len-nam",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 18,
        title: "yếm váy nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: yemvay,
        image02: yemvay2,
        image03: yemvay3,
        categorySlug: "yem",
        colors: ["đen"],
        slug: "yem-vay-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 19,
        title: "Áo croptop nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: croptop,
        image02: croptop2,
        image03: croptop3,
        categorySlug: "ao-croptop",
        colors: ["xanh", "đen"],
        slug: "ao-croptop-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
    {
        id: 20,
        title: "váy sơmi nữ",
        price: "200000",
        image01: vaysomi,
        image02: vaysomi2,
        image03: vaysomi3,
        categorySlug: "vay",
        colors: ["đen", "nâu", "trắng"],
        slug: "vay-somi-nu",
        size: ["s", "m", "l", "xl"]
    },
]


const getAllProducts = () => products

const getProducts = (count) => {
    const max = products.length - count
    const min = 0
    const start = Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min) + min)
    return products.slice(start, start + count)
}

const productData = {
    getAllProducts,
    getProducts
}


export default productData
